appDesc.message: AMZScout mở rộng sẽ giúp bạn đưa ra quyết định chọn một niche dựa trên dữ liệu thực tế, không phải trực giác.

resultsTooltip.message: The number of products shown on the current Amazon page.

avgSalesRank.message: Thứ hạng doanh số trung bình

avgSalesRankTooltip.message: “Average Sales Rank” refers to the average sales rank for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

opScoreTooltip.message: This score is based on the niche’s profits, level of demand, and competition. The Niche Score is only available on the search page.

avgMonthlyRevenue.message: Lợi tức trung bình hàng tháng

avgMonthlyRevenueTooltip.message: “Average Monthly Revenue” refers to the average revenue per month for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

avgMonthlySales.message: Doanh thu hàng tháng trung bình

avgMonthlySalesTooltip.message: “Average Monthly Sales” refers to the average number of sales each month for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

variantsTooltip.message: This refers to the number of product variants, which means the same product may come in another color, size, design, or configuration.

avgPriceTooltip.message: This refers to the average price for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

avgMarginImpactTooltip.message: This refers to the average net margin for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

avgReviewsTooltip.message: This refers to the average reviews for any products shown on the current Amazon page.

nicheHistoryTooltip.message: This information includes the number of sales, rankings, and price data in the niche over different periods of time.

bsr30Tooltip.message: The average product’s best-seller rank (BSR) for the past 30 days.

price30Tooltip.message: The average price for the past 30 days.

minPriceTooltip.message: The lowest price for the item, across all sellers.

lqsTooltip.message: The Listing Quality Score (LQS) indicates how good the listing is. Click on the value to see what factors contribute to this score.

categoryTooltip.message: Categories are used to organize product information and make it easier for customers to find what they're searching for.

enablePS.message: Kích hoạt tính năng bật lên AMZScout Niche

extractOneProductOnly.message: Chỉ trích xuất một Sản phẩm tại Trang sản phẩm

sellersTooltip.message: The number of people or businesses selling this product on Amazon.

estSalesTooltip.message: Doanh số ước tính hàng tháng

estRevenueTooltip.message: Lợi tức ước tính hàng tháng

reviewsTooltip.message: The number of reviews regarding the buyer's satisfaction with a particular product.

rprTooltip.message: This is the ratio of how much revenue a seller makes, per one review. A higher number means it’s relatively easy for a new seller to enter the niche.

availableFromTooltip.message: The date when the product first became available on Amazon.

ratingTooltip.message: The average score (ranges from one to five), is based on the total number of reviews that buyers submit for a product.

sellerTypeTooltip.message: There are three types of sellers on Amazon: Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA), Fulfillment by Merchant (FBM), and Amazon itself (AMZ).

needPermissions.message: Vui lòng đăng nhập trước khi tiếp tục

instanceUnsupportedErr.message: Phiên bản AMZScout này không còn được hỗ trợ. Vui lòng cập nhật AMZScout lên phiên bản mới nhất.

instanceBlockedErr.message: Thể hiện của AMZScout này đã bị chặn. Vui lòng liên hệ với bộ phận hỗ trợ.

unhandledErr.message: Có vẻ như bạn vào sai trang. Vui lòng thử trang khác.

marginImpactTooltip.message: An item’s margins after paying FBA fees. This figure is shown as a percentage.

Đăng ký để tìm

faq_q_0.message: Is the cost for the PRO Extension a one-time fee or is it monthly?

faq_a_0.message: You can purchase a monthly, annual, or lifetime subscription for the PRO Extension here. You will be charged monthly or annually, and the license will be extended. If you opt for a lifetime license, it will be a one-time fee only.

faq_q_1.message: I bought the PRO Extension, how do I use it?

faq_a_1.message: Check out the PRO Extension tutorial so you can enjoy a quick and productive start with your profitable product research! If you have any questions after that, our support will be happy to help, just email support@amzscout.net.

faq_q_2.message: Are the values in PRO Extension monthly, daily, or yearly estimates?

faq_a_2.message: Sales, revenue, and other parameters you see right away are estimated monthly values. You can see daily estimates on the product history diagram.

faq_q_3.message: How are the estimated values calculated?

faq_a_3.message: These values are calculated using the formula we developed, and is updated continuously to match Amazon closely. It relies on the ranking of the product in a category.

faq_q_4.message: What does the Net Margin column mean?

faq_a_4.message: This refers to the amount you’ll see from selling an item after Amazon’s FBA and referral fees.

faq_q_5.message: What does the LQS column mean?

faq_a_5.message: This stands for Listing Quality Score. AMZScout analyzes many product description aspects to evaluate the listing quality. The lower the average LQS in the niche, the easier it is to enter that market, since you can make a superior listing and stand out from the competition. To see more details, hover your cursor over the LQS value.

faq_q_6.message: What does the RPR column mean?

faq_a_6.message: RPR stands for Revenue Per Review. This metric reflects monthly revenue volume relative to the number of reviews a product has. A higher RPR means better selling opportunities on Amazon.

faq_q_7.message: Is the FBA fee calculated by piece or by volume?

faq_a_7.message: The FBA fee is calculated by piece, and is based on the shipping size and shipping weight on the product page. This amount indicates the fees for one month.

faq_q_8.message: What is the difference between the PRO Extension and the AMZScout desktop app?

faq_a_8.message: The PRO Extension focuses more on the niche evaluation, while the AMZScout desktop app helps you find an exact product, and then provides keywords to actually help you sell the product. Please check out the Amazon Seller's Bundle and for specific details about how each of our tools can be used.

faq_q_9.message: If I have another question or problem with AMZScout, how can I get support?

faq_a_9.message: The fastest way to get support is by emailing your question to support@amzscout.net.

alreadyPaidQuestion.message: If you paid for PRO Extension and are still experiencing licensing issues, please follow these steps to fix it:

alreadyPaidStep1.message: Delete the AMZScout PRO Extension from your Chrome browser

alreadyPaidStep2.message: Reinstall the AMZScout PRO Extension on Chrome

alreadyPaidStep2Edge.message: Reinstall the AMZScout PRO Extension on Edge

alreadyPaidStep3.message: Log on to the AMZScout PRO Extension on Chrome, and enjoy!

alreadyPaidContact.message: Please contact us at support@amzscout.net if this didn’t solve the problem.

onboardNotShure.message: Not sure what to look for? Try one of our suggestions:

onboardResearch.message: Research you first niche with PRO Extension!

onboardCheck.message: To check whether a niche is profitable, simply enter its name and click «Check If Profitable».

onboardWillsee.message: You will see items with similar names currently sold on Amazon along with their Monthly Sales, Reviews, Best Seller Rank, and other key statistics you need to evaluate them.

onboardHelps.message: PRO Extension helps you find the perfect product to sell on Amazon

onboardSelect.message: Select your experience level with Amazon

onboardAdjust.message: We will adjust the amount of pop up tips and certain parameters based on your experience. You will be able to change this choice later in the Settings.

onboardYouNew.message: If you are new to Amazon research, you’ll see vital parameters that will help you choose a great product quickly. Great for learning.

onboardAsExpert.message: As an expert, you’ll see the full data and be able to fine-tune your research.

negativeNumberTooltip.message: Beware, this is a negative Est.Monthly Profit / Net Margin / Profit Per Unit you might have if you sell with an FBA program. The sellers of this product actually have a positive profit because they are selling as FBM or through Vendor Central, who pay different fees.

saturationScoreTooltip.message: This score is based on a percentage of AMZScout customers who found this product niche.

saturationScoreTTLow.message: :visits% of our users have found this niche. A very small number of sellers have noticed this niche while researching the market. The chances of making a successful business and significant profit in this niche are extremely high.

saturationScoreMiddle.message: :visits% of our users have found this niche. Although a significant number of sellers consider this niche in their market research, there aren't too many of them. It makes sense to enter and take a position in this niche right now because it has significant potential and is not yet saturated.

saturationScoreHigh.message: :visits% of our users have found this niche. This niche is often seen by many sellers researching the market. Their high interest in this niche can indicate either that it is a large niche with big sales and high competition or that there are some notable trends prompting sellers to market research in this niche.

variationsTips.message:
Products on Amazon can have multiple variations (eg. colors, sizes, etc).

This product has :variations variations on Amazon. The Sales Estimation column provided in PRO Extension is for all variations added together. If you would like to check the popularity and demand for a specific color or size of a product, you can enter corresponding keywords into Keyword Search.

searchPlaceHolder.message: Enter a product to search, eg. plastic straw rug

naTooltip.message: There is no relevant data about this parameter of the product on Amazon

sellerTipsDescription.message:
AMZScout Product Database generates profitable product ideas and allows the opportunity to select the best products out of a profitable niche on 10 Amazon marketplaces.
We are happy to share our knowledge on using the Product Database.
Please specify which suggestions are more applicable to your goals when starting and growing an Amazon business.

sellerTipsOption1.message:
Launch your brand on Amazon

(for a budget from $$3,000)

sellerTipsOption2.message:
Start selling quickly without launching a brand

(for a budget from $$500)

stepHeader_br1.message: Launch Your Amazon Brand with the AMZScout PRO Extension

stepHeader_br2.message: Start Selling Quickly without Launching a Brand

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st1.message:
After you get analytics for the products you are interested in using the PRO Extension, view the data of the listed product:

  • Sellers rank: The lower rank, the better a product sells in a certain category
  • Estimated sales: Over 300 per month indicates a strong product performance.
  • Net margin: A good margin is estimated to be over 50%, since it provides a gross profit

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st2.message:
Check the first available data and LQS parameter.

  • The date when the product was first available onAmazon shows if the product is brand new or not.
  • Listing Quality Score (LQS):Provides a score from 0 to 100 of how well organized a listing is. The lower score, the lower the discoverability is in search results for a listing.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st3.message: Examine the Niche Score to see if your chosen niche has potential. The score of the niche is based on profit, competition, and demand (1 - it's extremely difficult to succeed in this niche, 10 - it's very likely to succeed in this niche).

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st4.message: Discover the Visibility Score that will help you understand how many AMZScout users found this niche during this month (1 - unsaturated, less than 10 people, 10 - extremely saturated). The fewer the better, as it means there will be less competition.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st5.message: Check the product score for Private Label, which indicates if the margin, the level of competition, and the demand of the product suit the Private Label business. Make note of products that have a product score over 7.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st6.message:
Click the arrow to the left of the product you’d like to check and click the product history. You will see how the product has sold over the period, so you will know if it’s in demand.

Analyze various niches and choose a few with the best numbers. This is your shortlist.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st7.message: Drive customers to your product listings with keywords from "Niche keywords". The number in parentheses next to a keyword indicates the number of times the word has been mentioned in product titles on an Amazon page. In addition, you can find all the keywords for a specific product using the "Get Keywords" button on the functional bar next to the "Product History" button.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st8.message: Find a reliable supplier with “Suppliers on Alibaba”. Here, you can choose the right supplier for you from almost anywhere in the world – from the United States of America to China. If you have requirements by trade currency, purchase price, or minimum order quantity, you can also filter vendors by those criteria. If it is important to you that the supplier is verified and only supports trade assurances, then this feature will also suit your requirements.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br1_st9.message:
Awesome!

You now have all the knowledge about using the AMZScout PRO Extension to help you easily find profitable, low-competition products, the best keywords to promote on Amazon, and reliable suppliers.

Good luck in business!

sellerTipsStepDescription_br2_st1.message:
After you get analytics for the products you are interested in using the PRO Extension, view the data of the listed product.

  • Net margin: It is preferable to have a margin over 50% so that you will still make a profit after paying the costs.
  • The date when the product was first available on Amazon: This indicator is helpful to understand whether the product is consistently reliable or if it’s brand new.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br2_st2.message: Click the arrow to the left of the product you’d like to check and click the product history. You will see how the product has sold over the period, so you will know if it’s in demand or whether the product is seasonal (for example, not many people would like to buy Christmas decorations during summer). Look how the price fluctuates throughout the year to see if it will be profitable to sell this product.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br2_st3.message: Check the product score for reselling with online arbitrage, dropshipping and wholesale, which indicates if margin, the level of competition, and the demand of the certain product suit the reselling business model. Make note of products that have a product score over 7.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br2_st4.message: Pay attention to the Visibility Score, as it will help you understand how many AMZScout users found this niche during this month (1 - unsaturated, less than 10 people, 10 - extremely saturated). The fewer the better, as it means there will be less competition.

sellerTipsStepDescription_br2_st5.message:
Great!

Checking sales trends is a crucial step in finding items that will be profitable for you to purchase and resell with online arbitrage, dropshipping and wholesale on Amazon. AMZScout’s PRO Extension is the best tool to help you to do it.

Good luck in the future!

column_graph_tooltip_1.message: Click on any number in this column to get a history graph.

column_graph_tooltip_2.message: Click on the blue numbers in this column to get a review history graph for each variation of the products.

a_plus_tooltip.message: Registered Brands may have higher quality listings that include enhanced images, videos, and more on their product pages. This is called “A+ Content”. This enables you to see if a product has an enhanced listing (previously called "EBС").
